title: Aping Philosophy
itunes:subtitle: Philosophy Now Radio Show #5
itunes:author: Philosophy Now
description: Grant Bartley from Philosophy Now talks to Raymond Tallis about why the mind is not the brain and human beings are not merely animals, and other ideas from Prof. Tallis’s new book Aping Mankind. First broadcast on 12 July 2011 on Resonance FM.
itunes:summary: Grant Bartley from Philosophy Now talks to Raymond Tallis about why the mind is not the brain and human beings are not merely animals, and other ideas from Prof. Tallis’s new book Aping Mankind. First broadcast on 12 July 2011 on Resonance FM.
